name: Dino Survivor
description: EAT! And GET BIG! Don't get EATEN! Don't Get STOMPED ON! Start out as a little dino hatchling and get bigger as you much on bugs, then bigger meals all within a platformer / runner genre. Features the latest in high performance graphics, 2D and 3D art assets, high quality terrain and skinned dino animation. Real time physics interactions and procedural terrain create an immersive gameplay experience.
